ValidationRule.description: Status Accepted cannot be changed for verizon CQ quotes except for CQ Business admin. Re1. 6129
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin ), CQ_eQuote__c , Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), 'Accepted'), ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), OR( Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Draft', Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Approved', AND( Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Rebid', CQ_isRebid_Done__c = False), Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Closed (Won)') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "Approval Stage" cannot be changed manually from the stage "Accepted" to "Closed (Won)" or "Rebid" or "Approved" or "Draft" for a Verizon Quote. Please use the "Rebid" button to rebid.
